<cs> my lords if the noble and learned lord had confined his reply to the last couple of sentences i should be much happier because the reason that he gave in relation to patent specifications was if i may say so a little unrealistic to a practitioner like myself in this area <e> <s> it often happens that patent specifications are kept in the possession of a company for no reason whatever they just happen to be there <e> <s> however in view of the fact that the noble and learned lord has indicated that he feels that my particular example does fall within the scope of the bill as it is i beg leave to withdraw my amendment <e>
